subject: Sex Crimes
Discrimination
lead_paragraph: An appeals court in Seattle has reinstated a lawsuit against the University of Washington by a woman who said she was raped by a football player. The university is accused of sex discrimination.The woman is a former equipment manager who says she was assaulted by Roc Alexander in 2001, after they ended a relationship. Alexander denies the rape accusation. He now plays for the Houston Texans.A lawyer for the university, Andrew Cooley, said that the woman never told the university that she had been raped and that he considered the matter closed after mediation.Rebecca Roe, a lawyer for the woman, said that using mediation was inappropriate because it suggested shared responsibility.
